subject: Running
lead_paragraph: Alan Webb, who holds the American record in the mile, dropped out of the Carlsbad 5000 in California about a half-mile before the finish of the 3.1-mile road race, his legs hurting too much even to jog in. Terefe Maregu Zewdie of Ethiopia sprinted the final 50 meters to win the race in 13 minutes 34 seconds, slow for a race billed as the world’s fastest 5K.
